body.p:
Frankfort Ky
Aug 22nd 1861 --
Dr J. M. Johnson & Judge Campbell
Paducah Ky --

I will do all in my power to protect the lives property & peace of our people. Report as dir requested in my dispatch of the morning after conference with Commander at Cairo, and include Seizure of Steamer Ferry --
